translations.englishText: I love reading books in my spare time.
translations.chineseText: 我喜欢在空闲时间看书。

translations.englishText: Could you please help me with this problem?
translations.chineseText: 你能帮我解决这个问题吗？
这家餐厅的食物很美味。

translations.englishText: She is studying computer science at university.
translations.chineseText: 她在大学学习计算机科学。

translations.englishText: The train will arrive in ten minutes.
translations.chineseText: 火车将在十分钟后到达。

translations.englishText: Please remember to bring your passport.
The museum is closed on Mondays.
This movie is based on a true story.
translations.chineseText: 这部电影改编自真实故事。

translations.englishText: Can you speak more slowly, please?
The concert will begin at 8 PM.
translations.chineseText: 音乐会将在晚上8点开始。

translations.englishText: She has been learning Chinese for three years.
translations.chineseText: 她学习中文已经三年了。

translations.englishText: The package should arrive by next week.
Would you like sugar in your coffee?
The meeting has been rescheduled to tomorrow.
